470770.name: Mini's Magic World - Soundtrack
470770.description:
Soundtrack for Mini's Magic World composed by Tomasz Kucza in MP3 and high quality FLAC formats.

Track list

1. Overture
2. The Tower of Magic
3. Candyland Adventure
4. Desert Run
5. Forest Theme
6. Ghost Tower
7. Forest at Night
8. Retroforest
9. Being a Boss
10. Underground Lair
11. Evil Wizard
12. Bonus Track - Space Bubble Shooter
13. Bonus Track - BRIK Brick Breaker

Credits:

Written and Produced by Tomasz Kucza

Artwork by Tomasz Kucza based on graphics by Olga Bikmullina

Songs will be placed in the Minis Magic World folder in the Steam Directory:
…\Steam\steamapps\common\Minis Magic World\Original Soundtrack\
470770.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
